page.title: 08GAMES IN BUCKLAND BREWER
page.content:
{BRITISH BULLDOG
THESE ARE THE RULES FOR BRITISH BULLDOG.FIRST OF ALL YOU LINE UP AT ONE END OF THE PLAYGROUND AND THERE IS SOMEBODY ELSE IN THE MIDDLE OF THE PLAYGROUND WHO IS "IT".THE PERSON WHO IS IT CALLS A PERSON FROM THE LINE AND THAT PERSON HAS TO DODGE THE PERSON WHO IS "IT". IF HE GETS TO THE END HE GIVES THE WORD FOR THE REST TO FOLLOW HIM TO THE END OF THE PLAYGROUND. IF ONE OF THEM IS CAUGHT HE HELPS "IT", AND CHOOSES A DIFFERENT PERSON TO RUN. WHEN THE CATCHER CATCHES SOMEONE HE SAYS "BRITISH BULLDOG ONE TWO THREE". THE LAST TO BE CAUGHT IS "IT" FOR THE NEXT GAME.
